entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Port System.Net documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88569
    8.0.0
  • Port System.IO documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88568
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Diagnostics documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88567
    8.0.0
  • Port System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88566
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Collections documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88565
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Buffers documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88564
    8.0.0
  • Por System documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88563
    8.0.0
  • Port Microsoft.Extensions documentation from .NET 8.0 APIs #88562
    8.0.0
  • Documenting .NET 8.0 APIs #88561
    8.0.0
  • Inspecting private members of RegistryKey in debugger causes it to be disposed #88556

Closed

  • [wasm] WasmBase.IsSupported no longer returns true #88494
    8.0.0
  • API Proposal: Add ConfigurationBinder.Bind<T> overloads #43930
    Future
  • .NET 7.0.7 coreclr.dll symbol file missing #88549

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce boxing in logging #88560
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Vector128.ShuffleUnsafe #88559
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Presize dictionary in regex interpreter #88558
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • add test for SslClientAuthenticationOptions.ShallowClone #88557
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Add missing sections in implicit machine.config #88553
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Improve byte array allocations with ArrayPool #88551
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Added QuicException.TransportErrorCode #88550
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #88548
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW

Merged

  • Fix XML doc for Avx.Floor #88552
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix Position and Seek for MemoryStream with custom origin #88572
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Convert RuntimeHelpers intrinsics to JIT ones #88543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add some xml comments #88433
    area-Meta
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2217349 #88506
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fixes #82871 Add an additional constructor for StackTrace #88542
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fixing a concurrency bug in ManagedWebSocket which may cause memory corruption #87966
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
